laws.name: Natural Person
laws.description: Refers to a human being.

laws.name: Pedestrian
laws.description: Any person afoot or using a wheelchair or means of conveyance propelled by human power other than a bicycle.

laws.name: Registered Owner
laws.description: The person whose lawful right of possession of a vehicle has most recently been recorded.

laws.name: Vehicle
laws.description: Device capable of being moved upon a public highway (excludes golf carts, bicycles, mobility scooters).

laws.name: Motor Vehicle
laws.description: Refers to a vehicle that is self-propelled.

laws.name: Off Road Vehicle (ORV)
laws.description: Non-street registered vehicle for recreational use (ATVs, motorcycles, 4WD, dune buggies).

laws.name: Commercial Vehicle
laws.description: Vehicle used primarily for transportation of commodities, freight, animals, or passengers for hire.

laws.name: Drifting
laws.description: Intentional oversteer causing loss of traction while maneuvering in a turning direction.

laws.name: Peace Officer
laws.description: Full-time, commissioned officer authorized to enforce criminal laws of San Andreas.

laws.name: Sabotage
laws.description: Intentional injury or interference with management/control of any agricultural, manufacturing, or commercial enterprise.

laws.name: Identity Theft
laws.description: Knowingly using/transferring means of identification of another with intent to commit a crime.

laws.name: Carrying Firearms (License)
laws.description: Regulations regarding the issuance of concealed pistol licenses (5-year term).

laws.name: Carrying Firearms (Illegal)
laws.description: Carrying a concealed pistol without a license. License must be displayed on demand.

laws.name: Unlawful Firearms/Parts
laws.description: Possession of machine guns, short-barreled shotguns, or conversion parts. Contraband.

laws.name: Alteration of ID Marks
laws.description: Removing or obliterating manufacturer name/serial on a firearm.

laws.name: Aiming or Discharging
laws.description: Aiming at human beings or willfully discharging in public/endangered places.

laws.name: Threats to Bomb/Injure
laws.description: Unlawful threat to bomb or injure property/public assembly, or communicating false info.

laws.name: Telephone Harassment
laws.description: Intent to harass using lewd language, anonymous/repeated calls, or threatening injury.

laws.name: Murder 1st Degree
laws.description: Premeditated intent to cause death, extreme indifference to life, or killing during major felony.

laws.name: Murder 2nd Degree
laws.description: Intent to kill without premeditation, or killing during any felony (including assault).

laws.name: Manslaughter 1st Degree
laws.description: Recklessly causing the death of another person.

laws.name: Manslaughter 2nd Degree
laws.description: Criminal negligence causing the death of another person.

laws.name: Assault 1st Degree
laws.description: Intent to inflict great bodily harm using firearm/weapon or force.

laws.name: Assault 2nd Degree
laws.description: Intentionally assaulting another and recklessly inflicting substantial harm or using deadly weapon.

laws.name: Assault 3rd Degree
laws.description: Assaulting protected persons (LEO, FD, Medical, Transit) or negligent injury with weapon.

laws.name: Assault 4th Degree
laws.description: Simple assault not amounting to higher degrees.

laws.name: Drive-by Shooting
laws.description: Recklessly discharging firearm from a motor vehicle creating risk of death/injury.

laws.name: Reckless Endangerment
laws.description: Reckless conduct creating substantial risk of death or serious injury.

laws.name: Failing to Summon Assistance
laws.description: Failure to call for help when present during a crime resulting in substantial bodily harm.

laws.name: Kidnapping 1st Degree
laws.description: Abducting person for ransom, hostage, or to facilitate felony/injury.

laws.name: Kidnapping 2nd Degree
laws.description: Intentional abduction without aggravating factors.

laws.name: Stalking
laws.description: Repeated harassment, following, or tracking after notice to stop.

laws.name: Arson 1st Degree
laws.description: Fire/explosion dangerous to human life or damaging a dwelling.

laws.name: Arson 2nd Degree
laws.description: Fire/explosion damaging structure, vehicle, wharf, or timber.

laws.name: Malicious Mischief
laws.description: Physical damage to property or interruption of public services.

laws.name: Burglary 1st Degree
laws.description: Entering building with intent to commit crime while armed or committing assault.

laws.name: Burglary 2nd Degree
laws.description: Entering building (not vehicle/dwelling) with intent to commit crime.

laws.name: Residential Burglary
laws.description: Entering a dwelling with intent to commit a crime.

laws.name: Making/Having Burglar Tools
laws.description: Possession or making of tools designed for burglary with intent to employ them.

laws.name: Criminal Trespass 1st Degree
laws.description: Knowingly entering or remaining unlawfully in a building.

laws.name: Criminal Trespass 2nd Degree
laws.description: Entering premises of another (not building).

laws.name: Vehicle Prowling 1st Degree
laws.description: Entering motor home with intent to commit crime.

laws.name: Vehicle Prowling 2nd Degree
laws.description: Entering vehicle (not motor home) with intent to commit crime.

laws.name: Theft 1st Degree
laws.description: Theft of property/services > $5,000 or taken from a person.

laws.name: Theft 2nd Degree
laws.description: Theft of property/services $750 - $5,000.

laws.name: Theft 3rd Degree
laws.description: Theft of property/services <= $750.

laws.name: Possession Stolen Vehicle
laws.description: Possessing a stolen motor vehicle.

laws.name: Taking Vehicle 1st Degree
laws.description: Taking vehicle without permission to alter appearance, sell parts, or export.

laws.name: Robbery 1st Degree
laws.description: Robbery while armed, inflicting injury, or against a financial institution.

laws.name: Robbery 2nd Degree
laws.description: Simple robbery without aggravating factors.

laws.name: Theft of a Firearm
laws.description: Theft of any firearm.

laws.name: Possessing a Stolen Firearm
laws.description: Possessing or carrying a firearm known to be stolen.

laws.name: Organized Retail Theft
laws.description: Retail theft > $750 committed with an accomplice.

laws.name: Obstructing LEO
laws.description: Willfully hindering, delaying, or obstructing any LEO in official duties.

laws.name: Disarming LEO/CO
laws.description: Removing weapon from LEO/CO without consent.

laws.name: Resisting Arrest
laws.description: Intentionally preventing or attempting to prevent a lawful arrest.

laws.name: Escape 1st Degree
laws.description: Escaping from custody/detention while held for a felony conviction.

laws.name: False Statement
laws.description: Knowingly making a false/misleading material statement to a public servant.

laws.name: Harming Police Dog
laws.description: Maliciously injuring or killing a K9 or detection dog.

laws.name: Criminal Mischief
laws.description: Using force with 3+ others against persons or property.

laws.name: Failure to Disperse
laws.description: Refusing to leave an area of substantial risk when ordered by LEO.

laws.name: Disorderly Conduct
laws.description: Abusive language, disrupting assemblies, or obstructing traffic.

laws.name: False Reporting
laws.description: Initiating false reports likely to cause evacuation or alarm.

laws.name: Indecent Exposure
laws.description: Intentionally making open and obscene exposure of person.

laws.name: Prostitution
laws.description: Engaging or offering to engage in sexual conduct for a fee.

laws.name: Legend Drugs Fraud
laws.description: Obtaining prescription drugs via fraud, forgery, or false names.

laws.name: Drug Paraphernalia
laws.description: Possession of equipment used for planting, manufacturing, or using controlled substances.

laws.name: Drug Manufacturing/Delivery
laws.description: Unlawful manufacture, delivery, or possession with intent to deliver.

laws.name: Drug Possession/Use
laws.description: Possession or public use of controlled substance without prescription.

laws.name: Malicious Explosion
laws.description: Destroying property or structures via explosives.

laws.name: Explosives License
laws.description: Possession or transport of explosives without valid license.

laws.name: Smoking in Public
laws.description: Smoking in public places, employment, or within 25ft of such.

laws.name: Registration Required
laws.description: Operating vehicle without current registration or displaying plates.

laws.name: Unauthorized Driver
laws.description: Permitting unauthorized person to drive your vehicle.

laws.name: Driving Without License
laws.description: Driving on highway without first obtaining a valid license.

laws.name: Driving While Invalidated
laws.description: Driving while license is suspended or revoked.

laws.name: Lights Required
laws.description: Failure to display headlights/signals half hour after sunset or low visibility.

laws.name: Striking Unattended Property
laws.description: Failure to notify owner or leave notice after striking unattended vehicle/property.

laws.name: Hit & Run (Injury/Death)
laws.description: Failure to stop and remain at scene of accident involving injury/death.

laws.name: Obedience to Officers
laws.description: Refusing to comply with lawful order of LEO or Firefighter.

laws.name: Attempting to Elude
laws.description: Willful failure to stop and reckless driving while eluding pursuing LEO.

laws.name: Lane Usage
laws.description: Failure to drive on right side or stay in right-hand lane when available.

laws.name: Following Too Closely
laws.description: Failure to maintain reasonable and prudent following distance.

laws.name: Speed Limits
laws.description: Exceeding posted limits (25 Urban, 50 County, 60 Highway, 70 Rural).

laws.name: Reckless Driving
laws.description: Driving in willful or wanton disregard for safety.

laws.name: DUI
laws.description: Driving under influence of alcohol (>0.08%), Cannabis (>5.00 THC), or drugs.

laws.name: Open Container
laws.description: Drinking or possessing open alcohol in a motor vehicle.

laws.name: Vehicular Assault
laws.description: Causing substantial bodily harm via reckless or DUI driving.

laws.name: Negligent Driving
laws.description: Operating vehicle in a manner that endangers person or property.

laws.name: Racing on Highways
laws.description: Contesting relative speeds. Constitutes reckless driving.

laws.name: Illegal Parking
laws.description: Parking on sidewalks, intersections, near hydrants, or prohibited zones.

laws.name: Electronic Device Use
laws.description: Using personal electronic device while driving.

wildlife.title: Titles II, VI, VII - Wildlife & Environment

laws.name: Dangerous Wild Animals
laws.description: Owning or controlling potentially dangerous wild animals.

laws.name: Trespassing Animals
laws.description: Damage caused by livestock trespassing on enclosed land.

laws.name: Reckless Burning
laws.description: Knowingly causing fire endangering forestlands.

laws.name: Unextinguished Campfire
laws.description: Failure to extinguish campfire upon leaving.

laws.name: Illegal Dumping
laws.description: Dumping solid waste without permit onto ground or into waters.

laws.name: License Required
laws.description: Hunting, fishing, or taking wildlife/seaweed without license.

laws.name: False Info to Warden
laws.description: Providing false info regarding taking or possession of wildlife.

laws.name: Unlawful Fishing 1st Degree
laws.description: Taking 2x bag limit or using prohibited means (gaffs, snares, stones).

laws.name: Loaded Firearm in Vehicle
laws.description: Carrying loaded rifle/shotgun in motor vehicle or ORV.

laws.name: Wildlife Inspection Avoidance
laws.description: Failure to obey check station signs or produce equipment for inspection.
